description:
Survive until the end! A single player TPS game where you fight against terrorists all over the world! Weapons that will delight military fans! Exciting stages in different locations!
Enjoy a thrilling TPS game with a diverse game mode and various weapons that can be unlocked by leveling up.

・It is a TPS-style action and shooting game that is easy to use and full of excitement.
・Each stage has a mission based on the story. You can enjoy an exciting game.
・There are large and diverse worlds.
・There are story mode and additional mode, so you can enjoy them more.
・【EPISODE】 mode fights for the mission clear according to the story.
・【DEFENCE】 mode requires you to defeat terrorists who are constantly attacking and hold out as long as possible.
・You can enjoy a thrilling battle with the spectacular 3D graphics effect.
・There is an element of fun collecting weapons of various designs.

Become a member of the Special Forces, 
wipe out terrorist organizations and
Complete all the missions to see the true ending.
name: Urban Warfare: Assault
